mapper.insert: insert into user_record (id, login_Time, user_id, ip_address, login_address) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select id, login_Time, user_id, ip_address, login_address from user_record
